tool_description: Calculates precise astronomical positions of planets, luminaries, and key points for a given birth date, time, and location using ephemeris data.

birth_latitude.description: Birth location latitude in decimal degrees (-90 to 90).

birth_longitude.description: Birth location longitude in decimal degrees (-180 to 180).

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS).
Date out of range: Birth date must be between 1900-01-01 and 2100-12-31.
usage: Provide birth_date, birth_latitude, and birth_longitude to calculate planetary positions. Returns precise astronomical coordinates for all major celestial bodies.

planet_longitudes.description: Array of planetary longitudes for Mercury through Pluto
